name: GiftoLexia
description: GiftoLexia is a startup aimed towards helping dyslexic children, it is incubated in NSRCEL, IIM, Bangalore. The app provides a list of relevant resources which aide government teachers in teaching dyslexic students.

name: ASL Hand Gesture Classifier
description: Allows a user to make a request to an API with the JSON data of a sign language hand gesture video to a url and receive a JSON response containing the classification gestures of four different machine learning models. Built using: Python and Flask.

name: Stress Down
description: Monitors the user's stress levels using data from a GSR sensor and provides recommendations based on location if the user's stress levels escalate beyond a threshold. Built using: Android Studio, Python and Flask.

name: Jobs
description: A job search application that allows users to search for jobs in a particular location and swipe to like or dislike job listings based on job title, location, and description in Tinder like fashion. Built using: React-Native.

name: Tracks
description: A location tracking application that allows users to create and view records of their change in location over a period of time during a particular activity, for example a hike, bike ride or road trip. Built using: React-Native, MongoDB, Node and Express.

name: Blogs
description: A blog creation application that allows users to create, read, edit and delete blogs on a local JSON server. Built using: React-Native, Node and Express.

name: Expense Tracker
description: An expense tracking application that allows users to monitor their daily expenses. Built using: React, MongoDB, Node and Express.
